section.p: ‘I knew it!’ he shrieks. ‘The librarian sent you, didn’t he? Well, just you tell him that I’ll keep it as long as I want. I’m the Master! Me!’

He flicks a spell of summary dispatch. The room disappears, there is a whirling kaleidoscope around you, then you find yourself plummeting out of a clear sky to land with a thud at the base of a tall oak. Turn to 596 in The War-Torn Kingdom.
